values: 盖章；跺脚；用力踩；压实；冲压；标记；在…上盖（字样或图案等）；把（字样或图案等）盖在…上；印刻；贴邮票；捣碎；压碎；戳（文件等）以示认可（或记录）；用脚发出重击声（以表达愤怒或不耐烦）
邮票；戳记；印花；印章；印记；特征；风格；跺脚（声）；印模；印刷品；印花税票；邮资标志物；邮资预付标记

synonym.mean: 铭记；标出；盖章于…；贴邮票于…；用脚踩踏

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 铭刻的；盖上邮戳的；顿足的
贴上邮票（stamp的过去式）；顿足
打印器；盖印人；[机] 压模；印章

word_group.brief_definition: 收集邮票；收藏邮票；集邮
橡皮图章；官样文章式地批准他人决定的人；官样文章式的批准

bilingual.source: Every Christmas, an envelope with a North Pole stamp arrived.
bilingual.target: 每年圣诞节，一个带有北极邮票的信封会到达。

bilingual.source: You must make the stamp wet before you stick it to the letter.
bilingual.target: 你必须先把邮票弄湿再贴到信上。
他是一位著名的邮票收藏家。

bilingual.source: Can you help me put this stamp on?
bilingual.target: 你能帮我贴上这张邮票吗？

bilingual.source: Please stick on the stamp to the envelope.

bilingual.target: 她的邮票收藏品非常珍贵。

bilingual.source: The stamp on this postcard is from Japan.
bilingual.target: 这张明信片上的邮票来自日本。

bilingual.source: I need to buy a stamp to send this letter.
bilingual.target: 我需要买一张邮票来寄这封信。

list.abstract: stamp（英 [stæmp]，美 [stæmp]），英语单词，作及物动词使用，意思为捣碎、压碎、贴邮票于…等；作名词使用，意思为邮票、图章、印记。短语搭配有a set of stamps（一套邮票），例句为“The stamp price has gone down.（邮票价格下跌了。）” stamp相关近义词有symbol、brand、break down等，stamp复数形式为stamps。
创立于一九九八年，由一群于美国毕业具有丰富经验的专业工程师投资及共同创立。凭借着他们多年来坚持不屈的信念及丰富的经验，STAMP至今已在亚洲市场上占卓越的领导地位。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, stop what you're doing, I need envelope stuffers, I need stamp lickers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 放下手边的事，我需要人帮我塞信封、舔邮票。

yingyinNormal.en: At the second year after the Hannover, it's a souvenir stamp selling online for 20 Euros.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在汉诺威之后的第二年，这枚纪念邮票在网上售价为20欧。

yingyinNormal.en: Miss. Zoe zebra. And the last of all, the stamp. The letter is ready to be posted. This is the post box.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斑马佐伊小姐收。还有最重要的是，贴上邮票。这封信现在可以寄出去啦。这个是邮箱。

yingyinNormal.en: Alright, Internet is amazing. Before I came here, searching on the Alibaba Internet, the e-commerce site, we found a stamp which is (in)1948, Hannover Messe Export.
yingyinNormal.zh: 互联网很奇妙，在我来这里之前，我在阿里巴巴电子商务网上，我们找到一枚1948年汉诺威梅西出口纪念邮票。
我会全力支持你的，似道。

yingyinNormal.en: My job is all about numbers. I take very important pieces of paper. I take a rubber stamp, and I stamp the paper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的工作都是跟数字有关的，我会拿一些非常重要的纸，就像这样，我还要一个印章，然后我要在纸上盖章。

yingyinNormal.en: My job is all about numbers. I take a very important piece of paper. I take a rubber stamp, and I stamp the paper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的工作都是跟数字有关的，我会拿一张非常重要的纸，就像这样，我还要一个印章，然后我要在纸上盖章。

yingyinNormal.en: Excuse me, Ms. Crank. Plank. Ms. Plank? Yes? Hi. Oh. A frowny-face stamp. I didn't know they made those.
yingyinNormal.zh: 打扰了，可烂老师。普兰克，普兰克老师？什么事？你好，是个哭脸印章啊，我都不知道还有这玩意。

yingyinNormal.en: No, more of an opportunity for you to lighten your workload. Maybe turn that frowny-face stamp upside down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，更像是给您一个机会...减轻工作负担。也许能让哭脸印章倒过来。

yingyinNormal.en: Alright, in 6 days, this stamp will be delivered to the mayor office of Hannover as the gift online, and it's on the way. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在6天内，它将作为线上礼物被送到汉诺威市长办公室，它正在路上。谢谢。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: mark or cut out with a tool or device having a design
put your foot down heavily and noisily on the ground
reveal or mark out as having a particular character, quality, or ability;
the mark or sign of a particular quality or person
a kind or class, especially of people

word_usage.usage: stamp作动词时，通常为及物动词，其后常接名词或代词，也可用于stamp sth. sth.的结构，表示“给某物贴上某物“。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 打图章; 压印; 图章; 印花; 标记

sense_info_list.zh: 打图章; 压印; 图章; 印花; 标记

examination_example.sentence: According to this new model, the Master of Science (MSc) would become the first <highlight>stamp</highlight> in the lifelong learning journey.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据这种新的模式，理学硕士将成为终身学习旅程中的第一个印记。

examination_example.sentence: After the MSc diploma is earned, there would be many more <highlight>stamps</highlight> of lifelong learning over the years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 获得理学硕士文凭后，这些年将会有更多终身学习的类型。

examination_example.sentence: Many advocates think that transparent data procedures with a date and time <highlight>stamp</highlight> will protect scientists from being scooped.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多倡导者认为，带有日期和时间戳的透明数据程序将保护科学家不被窃取。

examination_example.sentence: One would go to prison if they put a <highlight>stamp</highlight> on upside down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果有人把邮票贴反了，他们就会进监狱。

examination_example.sentence: That is, if you put a postage <highlight>stamp</highlight> on upside down, you'll go to prison.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也就是说，如果你把邮票贴反了，你就会进监狱。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Under this Act, all waterfowl hunters 16 years of age and over must annually purchase and carry a Federal Duck <highlight>Stamp</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据这项法案，所有16岁及以上的水禽猎人必须每年购买并持有一枚联邦鸭票。

examination_example.sentence: Hunters willingly pay the <highlight>stamp</highlight> price to ensure the survival of our natural resources.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 狩猎者都愿意支付印花税，以确保我们的自然资源能够维持下去。

sense_info_list.en: put your foot down heavily and noisily on the ground

examination_example.sentence: The girls on the Wesleyan Academy softball were waiting for their next turns at bat during practice, <highlight>stamping</highlight> their feet to stay warm.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卫斯理学院垒球的女孩们在练习中等待下一轮击球，跺脚取暖。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 收集邮票；收藏邮票；集邮

examination_example.sentence: Visitors could buy other products about traditional food and culture, such as books, postcards and <highlight>stamps</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 游客可以购买其他有关传统食物和文化的产品，如书籍、明信片和邮票。

examination_example.sentence: We both liked playing basketball and collecting <highlight>stamps</highlight>, so we always had a lot of things to talk about.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们都喜欢打篮球和集邮，所以我们总是有很多事情可以谈论。

examination_example.sentence: My cousin likes to collect <highlight>stamps</highlight> in his spare time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的表弟喜欢在空闲时间收集邮票。
